entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:12 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -19.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 6:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -19.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 44 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -28.7°C
Wind: W 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
